soil_characteristics.fertility: Rich in potash and lime, low in nitrogen and phosphorus
soil_characteristics.workability: Hard when dry, sticky when wet

reasons: Black soil holds moisture, ideal for long-duration cotton crops

general_recommendations.crop_rotation: Rotate with pulses or legumes to maintain fertility
micronutrient_tips: Gypsum for high pH soil patches
general_recommendations.irrigation_tip: Black soil retains water; avoid over-irrigation to prevent root rot
